rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area with large windows and sliding glass doors facing the central courtyard for natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and Vastu-aligned placement to enhance prosperity. Features built-in storage and an adjoining pantry.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with ample closet space, positioned in the north-east sector as per Vastu principles for health and wellness.

rooms.name: Library / Study
rooms.description: A quiet study area/library located near the central courtyard to benefit from natural light and a peaceful ambience. Adheres to Vastu by ensuring proper alignment.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with essential fixtures and a separate water closet area for privacy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A wide entrance door designed with security in mind and placed facing the north for auspicious entry.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Courtyard
openings.description: A balcony that provides direct access to the central courtyard and garden view.

openings.name: Courtyard Window
openings.description: Large window overlooking the internal courtyard ensuring ample natural light in interior spaces.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: A landscaped courtyard in the heart of the property to enhance ventilation and provide a serene outdoor space.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: An expansive garden area with native plants, designed to promote sustainability and harmony with nature following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom on the upper level with a private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom adjacent to the additional bedroom ensuring convenience.

openings.name: Upper Floor Window
openings.description: Window providing a view of the garden and courtyard, ensuring ample natural light.

balconies.description: Balcony on upper floor overlooking the garden and courtyard.

staircase.description: Staircase providing access to upper floors, designed with Vastu principles in mind for optimal flow.
